results.title: Simvastatin Mitigates Apoptosis and Transforming Growth Factor-Beta Upregulation in Stretch-Induced Endothelial Cells
results.text_hl: Next, we investigated whether treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ mitigated @<m>DISEASE_Glucosephosphate_Dehydrogenase_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005955 @@@EC@@@ apoptosis by targeting @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@.
